description:
Would you like to be the one who gets the upper-hand on a narcissist/manipulator?

This course has a 4.9/5 Star rating with 30 Reviews and over 1250 students!

Students who take this course complete 45% more lectures than students in similar Personal Transformation Courses offered on Udemy. (This is an Engagement metric only shown to instructors.)

  • Tired of being told it is always your fault, you don't do anything right?
  • Tired of trying to explain your side and being told you are crazy, you don't remember right, you're just over reacting, you can't take a joke?
  • Do you wish you knew the techniques to prove that THEY ARE THE PROBLEM, not you?
  • This course is designed to teach you how to do just that.


"This Course is a Gold nugget !! I wish all people in the world can learn this information, because then there will be much more honesty and accountability for what we say." Carl Pohl

It doesn't matter who you are, ANYBODY can learn these techniques and get results instantly. Here is what one student said:
"Good info, great examples, immediately usable." Abbey Julia

Three sections of this course are designed to prepare someone who is being manipulated and is possibly not in a confident state. They may feel it is their fault and that needs to change. Sections 2, 4 and 8 will cover that particular situation. If this is not you, those sections still may be a good refresher.

Section 3 is necessary in order to use the actual techniques, which are described (and written) in:
  • Section 5 - Level 1: Direct Techniques
  • Section 6 - Level 2: Assertive Techniques
  • Section 7 - Level 3: Power Ending Speaking Technique


UPDATE February 19, 2016
Added: Homework exercise in Section 2 - Lecture 8.

"Essential, no Time wasting, Very Understandable, Concrete. Thanks a lot!" Full Pori

If you ever walked away from an interaction with a manipulator feeling upset, misunderstood, or taken advantage of, then I highly recommend you take this course.

If you start this course now you can begin to stop the manipulation today. It works that quick!

  • This course has a 30 Day Money Back Guarantee - Full Refund - No Questions Asked!
  • Once you enroll, you have unlimited lifetime access!
  • You will have instant and free access to all future updates.
  • I am here to help. I offer my full support to whatever questions or needs you may have. This can be a highly charged and emotional subject. I know, I have been there and I will be here for you if you want my help.
  • You can check out a few lectures for free before you make a financial commitment. Lectures: 2, 4, 15, 16, 22, 26, & 30.
title: How To Stop Manipulators And Narcissists
